name: agentic-social-feed
description: AI-powered tools for app development, UX testing, and social content - from Nimble Books LLC

plugins.name: agentic-social-feed
plugins.description: AI social feed with customizable book-lover personas optimized for neurochemical engagement. Skills: /myfeed, /socialfeed, /personas, /add-persona, /feed-prefs, /contribute, /import-posts, /showmethescience, /demo

plugins.name: appstore-launch
plugins.description: Generate complete App Store launch assets for macOS, iOS, and iPadOS apps - descriptions, keywords, screenshots, icons, video scripts, and social media content

plugins.name: ux-test
plugins.description: Run virtual user testing sessions with 7 AI personas to find UX friction points, accessibility issues, and delights before real users do
